scripts.generate:documents: npm run generate:pdf && npm run generate:docx
scripts.export: rm -rf deploy && mkdir -p deploy/_next/static && cp .next/server/pages/index.html deploy/ && cp .next/server/pages/404.html deploy/ && cp -r .next/static/* deploy/_next/static/ && cp -r public/* deploy/ && echo '✅ Static build complete! Files ready in deploy/ folder'
scripts.export:unified: npm run export && mkdir -p deploy/chat-widget && cp -r packages/chat-widget/dist/* deploy/chat-widget/ && echo '✅ Unified production build complete! Main app + Chat widget ready in deploy/'
scripts.test:chat-widget:watch: npm run build:production && npm run test:chat-widget
